## BaseAPIClient.request() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected request(method: "GET" | "POST" | "DELETE", path: string, options?: {
        json?: JSONObject;
        query?: [string, string][];
        autoRefreshToken?: boolean;
    }): Promise<any>;
```
